Jealousy.Dialog: So...I heard you secretly gave {{npcName}} a kiss today...$s#$e#Do I have to be suspicious of you?$s#$e#...$a
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.Requirements: Configurations of requirements for the kiss to happen.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.DisableDatin: If you need to be dating the NPC for the kissing to happen.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.DisableEvent: If you need to have seen an specific event for the kissing to happen. The event is specified in the NPC configuration.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.RequiredFrie: How much hearts you need for the kiss to happen. Set to zero to disable it.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.DisableJealo: If the spouse should get jealous if you kissed someone else. It will always happen if they are in the same location, otherwise it's lucky based.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.JealousyFrie: Amount of friendship points you lose with your spouse if they found out about you kissing another NPC. For reference, 250 is a full heart level.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.BenefitsSect: Configuration for positive effect from kissing an NPC.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.DisableExhau: Check if you want kissing to remove the Exhaustion debuff. Once a day per NPC.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.KissingFrien: How much friendship points you gain from kissing that npc. For reference, 250 is a full heart level.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.EnableConten: If content packs can override loaded configs. If disabled you should handle conflicts manually. If enabled the mod will always override and uses the config of the last content pack to loaded. Check you log for warnings about conflicts.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.DisableCurso: If the cursor heart indicator should be shown when its possible to kiss the NPC.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.NpcOperation: Operations to include and remove NPCs from the configuration list above. Operations done to the list will persit for the game session even if you don't save the changes. If you want to revert any change made do the list before saving, restart the game.
The name of the NPC to execute the operation. The name needs to be the internal name of the NPC, not the localized name.
Adds an NPC config to the list. Needs to be a existing NPC name that is not already in the list.
Remove the NPC config from the list. Needs to be a name from the list.
NPC already exist in the list.
NPC doesn't exist in the list.
NPC doesn't exist in the game.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.NpcConfig.Fr: The NPC frame that will be used when the farmer kiss the NPC. Use the scroll to find the frame that best suite the purpose. Not all values might map to a valid NPC sprite.
Check this if the NPC frame you chose is facing right. Otherwise the farmer will kiss the NPC backside.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.NpcConfig.Be: The NPC frame that will be used when the farmer kiss the NPC at the beach. Use the scroll to find the frame that best suite the purpose. Not all values might map to a valid NPC sprite.
Check this if the NPC beach frame you chose is facing right. Otherwise the farmer will kiss the NPC backside.
CustomKissingMod.ConfigMenu.NpcConfig.Re: The identifier of the event required for the NPC to be kissable. Leave empty to not require an event. Should usually be their 10 heart event.
